character.name: Zari
desc: A greedy dragon. Her cards <c=boldPink>draw</c> and <c=boldPink>discard</c> other cards, and provide lots of <c=boldPink>defensive utility</c>.

knowledge.name: Knowledge
knowledge.desc: Base limit of 3. When reaching the limit, spend the required <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> to gain 1 <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c> and 1 <c=status>LESSON</c>. Excess <c=status>KNOWLEDGE</c> is not lost.

ADiscardSelect.title: Discard Choice
ADiscardSelect.desc_single: Choose <c=boldPink>1</c> card to discard from your hand.
ADiscardSelect.desc: Choose <c=boldPink>{{cnt}}</c> cards to discard from your hand.

ADiscardFlexSelect.title: Flex Discard
ADiscardFlexSelect.desc_single: Choose <c=boldPink>any</c> number of cards to discard from your hand, or none at all.

Seek.name: Seek
Seek.desc: <c=downside>On discard,</c> pick a <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> card to draw.
Seek.descA: <c=downside>On discard,</c> pick a <c=boldPink>draw or discard pile</c> card to draw.
Seek.descB: <c=downside>On discard,</c> pick a <c=boldPink>draw pile</c> card to draw. Pick a card to discard.

BuriedKnowledge.name: BURIED KNOWLEDGE
BuriedKnowledge.desc: At the start of combat, add 3 <c=card>Ponder</c>s to the discard pile.

Lexicon.name: LEXICON
Lexicon.desc: Whenever you gain a <c=card>Ponder</c> during combat, it is given the A or B upgrade, alternating.
